name: I Can't Draw
description:
My game for the: "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)" game jam. It's about artist, that can't draw. She wants to learn how to draw, so she can impress her friends. So she goes to the Gallery of the Beach Art, for some inspiration.

AD or left and right arow keys for move. Space to jump.

WS or up and down arrow keys to control camera.
